Introduction
This topic includes information on considering supplemental claims, including
duty to provide Section 5103 notice
intent to files (ITFs) and
supplemental claims
, and
continuous pursuit in supplemental claims
definition of new and relevant
action required on evidence submitted with supplemental claims
supplemental claims on evaluation issues
, and
examinations and supplemental claims
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Revision Based on Specific Types of Submissions, Including Supplemental Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
